comments.en:
Works partially with the ghostscript 5.10 stcany.upp and stc2.upp drivers and -sDEVICE=stcolor -dMicroweave. The printout is readable but not good.

Glenn Ramsey wrote a set of stc300 uniprint drivers, they are available in GNU/AFPL/ESP Ghostscript 7.05 and newer.

It probably does not work with Gimp-Print.

Consumables/Refills: Ink cartridge (Epson P/N SO20138)
